message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I've priced it at $2000000, which reflects its exceptional value. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial deal. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time and effort, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your perspective. While I appreciate your offer, $1500000 doesn't quite cover the value I've placed on this product. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I'm proposing a price of $1750000. It's a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can both walk away happy with this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still thinking $1500000 is a fair price for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher, so I'll stick with my previous offer. Can you meet me at $1500000?
